long_description: Sized perfectly for minimalist touring, the SealLine Kodiak kayak deck bag includes a transparent window to help you locate your gear. Tough-as-nails polyurethane-coated nylon bag features a clear urethane window and keeps miscellaneous essentials easily accessible while paddling. Waterproof, radio frequency-welded seams and a low-profile shape protect gear against deck-washing waves. Easy-to-use rolldown closure keeps water out and featurs a protective splash guard. D-rings offer attachment points for map and electronic cases (not included); includes mounting bungee cords. PVC-free construction.
short_description: Sized perfectly for minimalist touring, the SealLine Kodiak kayak deck bag includes a transparent window to help you locate your gear.
